name: 0x06-unittests_in_js
description: ## Learning Objectives At the end of this project, you are expected to be able to explain to anyone, without the help of Google: * How to use Mocha to write a test suite * How to use different assertion libraries (Node or Chai) * How to present long test suites * When and how to use spies * When and how to use stubs * What are hooks and when to use them * Unit testing with Async functions * How to write integration tests with a small node server
